overview: Dreamlike satire about a young man who resists getting a job at the lone employing conglomerate in his dreary industrial town, but changes his mind when he discovers the plant's boiler room has the perfect climate to assist him with his pet horticultural (fungal) project.
tagline: This Film Is Perfectly Normal ... Only The Characters In It Are A Bit Odd.
title: Work Is a 4-Letter Word
